title: Unspecific error. I can't upgrade or delete or do anthing about the game
body:
I can't update the game in my PC and MAC. When I open it, it keep saying unspecific error please check the log. What the heck happens here. It's been two days. And how can I UPLOAD A PHOTO? 
I tried every methods in that guide. The problem is still there. I even repaired my external hard drive thinking maybe some bad sector there but none of the solutions work. And wired thing is I can't even delete the file. It says error 0x80070091. 
And I tried what microsoft says to repair it. But THAT IS NOT WORKING. Maybe SOMEONE at riot can tell me how to upload a photo or zip file? I can send you the logs and you guys can see what happens. This experience really sucks. I called my engineer friend yesterday tried to fix it but he can't do anything about it...

replies.body: I'd like to help with this but need to get some more information.  At what percent in your patcher is the error occurring?  If you want to post a screenshot, you can upload it to an image sharer like Imgur.com.  Let me know!

This is perfect, thanks!  It looks like your PC has some security setting that's preventing the patcher from scanning your game files.  Go over each step in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this resolved for good.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I've tried all methods and the situation remains the same.  I mean in that pic I download a latest version game installer from the website why it's still scanning and comparing? Shouldn't it be like I can just open and play ?

Reinstalling won't necessarily solve anything if your PC continues to block game files from being accessed.  If the guide wasn't able to resolve this, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a deeper look.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get more context via logs.  Attach those to your ticket, and we'll respond as soon as we can.
http://imgur.com/rCJluuB        I just download a new game from your official website.
It's not even loading. Just calculating differences, scanned one doc then the error message.
